template.name: search
template.value: <el-row> <el-col :span="4"> <el-button v-if="isCanEdit" type="primary" icon="el-icon-plus" @click="handleGoPage('routerName')">操作</el-button> </el-col> <el-col :span="20" align="right"> <el-form ref="form" :model="requestSearch" onsubmit="return false" :inline="true"> <el-form-item label="label" prop="title"> <el-input v-model.trim="requestSearch.input" placeholder="请输入" clearable /> </el-form-item> <base-search-reset @search="getTableData(true)" @reset="handleResetForm" /> </el-form> </el-col> </el-row>
